title: Review Time
description: How long does it take to conduct a one cycle of reviewing an artifact (code PR, task requirement, test-plan, etc).

title: Review Cycles
description: The number of review cycles it takes to approve a request.

title: Review Lead Time
description: The total period of time a task has been on a review, starting from task has been send on review, including waiting for the first reviewer to start a review, all review cycles, till getting an approval from the very last reviewer.

title: Review Feedback Quality
description: The clarity, relevance, and usefulness of comments provided during review.

title: Review Efficiency
description: How quickly and thoroughly reviewers complete a review.
interpretations: How quickly and thoroughly reviewers complete reviewing a code review.
How quickly and thoroughly reviewers complete reviewing a architecture design review.
How quickly and thoroughly reviewers complete reviewing a task requirement review.
How thorough developers understand a task requirement before they start working on it.
How thorough quality engineers understand a task requirement before they start working on it.

related.description: poor requirement-review-efficiency (unclear, incomplete, or rushed requirements) **leads to** implementing the wrong functionality or missing edge cases, resulting in more bugs after it was merged.
poor requirement-review-efficiency (unclear, incomplete, or rushed requirements) **leads to** increasing number of changes to the same feature after it was released.
high requirement-review-efficiency leads to find more bugs on review phase (shifting left testing).

title: Review Bug Discovery Count
description: The number of bugs or defects discovered during the review process.

title: Post Merge Bug Discovery Count
description: The number of bugs found after merging, indicating the effectiveness of the review in catching defects.

title: Review Feedback Count
description: The number and type of comments made during reviews, indicating the thoroughness of the review.
